body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.6 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Beginnings of schannel implementation using GnuTLS.
Many fixes from various code analysis tools.
Support for X11 desktop work area.
Fixes for Richedit tables.
More complete JavaScript support.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
